document_data.name: Elaacrimalicros
document_data.mainbody: '''Elaacrimalicros''', also known as '''Elaar''', was a [[green dragon]] who made his home among the [[Star Mounts]] in the [[High Forest]]. He was thought to be by far the oldest [[dragon]] living in the High Forest as of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was rapacious, cruel, and delighted in killing.{{Cite document/Elemental Evil Player's Companion|5}} He was also very private, and thus very dilligent in protecting his territory.
document_data.Activities: Elaacrimalicros spent much of his time asleep, only awakening once every few decades. When he did, he seemed to take care to eliminate any who attempted to scale the Star Mounts, and would engage in flyby attacks to fling climbers off the mountainsides.
document_data.Relationships: Because he destroyed their homes, the [[aarakocra]] who once dwelt on the Star Mounts—along with their descendants—all swore revenge on Elaacrimalicros.{{Cite web/Perilous Gateways/Aarakocran Portals:Elemental Plane of Air Portal}} One group in particular, a cabal of ten [[wizards]], [[clerics]], and [[druids]] known as the [[Nest of Retribution]], was amassing an army of [[air elemental]]s at the [[Lost Peaks]] in preparation to attack the dragon as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
document_data.History:
In the 1360s DR, Elaacrimalicros was awoken, although it was not clear at the time what had awakened him. He immediately set about savaging the five local settlements of aarakocra who had come to dwell on the Star Mounts, consuming over 120 of them and scattering the rest across the [[North]] and as far south as [[Cormyr]]. Only a few survivors remained in the Star Mounts, coming together at the head of the [[Unicorn Run]] in a new village known as the [[Last Aerie]].

In the following years, he continued to haunt the Star Mounts, and it was rumored that he was protecting a great treasure.

By the late 15{{th}} century DR, the descendants of the aarakocra driven from the Star Mounts continued to plot and quest to kill Elaacrimalicros.
